thread.title: BobbiandMarvin Wages

author: BobbiandMarvin Wages
title: BobbiandMarvin Wages
text: I wanted to get something special for my two sisters. The your name in Hebrew name necklaces was the perfect choice. The price was very affordable & I was able to get them in different metals. I order them as gifts to be sent them to different countries . There was no problems in the ordering or delivery. Bottom line they loved them & I will order from them again.
